message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire a truly unique product that has immense potential. While I can't disclose all the details at this stage, I can assure you it's worth at least $1500000 to me.  I'm confident it can be even more valuable in the right hands.  I'm offering you the chance to purchase it for $1800000.  I'm sure you'll agree this is a very attractive price.  Think about it and let me know your decision.
